summary: With the help of his two precocious kids, a widower reconnects with his high school sweetheart, who just happens to be one of the biggest pop stars on the planet.
cast: Shannon Elizabeth|Steve Byers|Julia Lalonde|Kyle Breitkopf|Doug MacLeod|Maria Ricossa|Billy MacLellan|Christopher Jacot|Zack Werner|Traci Melchor|Melissa Grelo|Christopher Russell|Darryl Flatman|Darren Josephs
keywords: pop star|female singer|famous singer|christmas movie|tv movie
title: Volver a enamorarse
